name: Carapace Armor
description: Living armor that bonds with the wearer's skin, hardening in response to threats

name: Glow Wasp Lantern
description: A docile wasp colony modified to emit bright bioluminescence on command

name: Blood Leech Purifier
description: Symbiotic leeches that attach to the host and filter toxins from their bloodstream

name: Bone Weaver Spider
description: Modified spider that secretes calcium-rich silk to mend broken bones

name: Echo Bat Messenger
description: Bat engineered with enhanced memory to deliver messages between locations

name: Muscle Fiber Graft
description: Living muscle tissue that integrates with the host to enhance strength

name: Acid Spit Gland
description: Implanted gland that allows the host to produce and spit corrosive acid

name: Living Lockpick
description: Tentacled organism that can navigate and manipulate lock mechanisms

name: Scent Hound Symbiont
description: Nasal cavity enhancement that grants tracking abilities equal to a bloodhound

name: Breathing Gill Collar
description: Living collar that extracts oxygen from water for underwater breathing

name: Camouflage Skin
description: Grafted skin layer with chromatophores for adaptive camouflage

name: Toxic Spore Pouch
description: Fungal sac that releases paralytic spores when squeezed

name: Living Rope
description: Snake-like organism that can extend, contract, and grip on command

name: Memory Worm
description: Symbiotic worm that enhances memory storage and recall

name: Healing Cocoon
description: Chrysalis-like organism that envelops wounds and accelerates healing

name: Living Compass
description: Magnetoreceptive organism that always points to magnetic north

name: Venom Fang Implants
description: Retractable fangs with customizable venom sacs

name: Living Parachute
description: Membrane organism that expands into a functional parachute when falling

name: Sonic Scream Throat
description: Vocal cord modification that produces stunning sonic attacks

name: Thermal Vision Eyes
description: Eye modification that allows perception of heat signatures

name: Living Backpack
description: Symbiotic creature that clings to the back and stores items in specialized pouches

name: Pheromone Emitter
description: Gland system that produces various pheromones for influence and communication

name: Living Grappling Hook
description: Tentacle creature that can extend and anchor to distant surfaces

name: Detox Liver Symbiont
description: Additional liver organ that processes poisons and alcohol at accelerated rates

name: Bone Blade Arm
description: Arm modification where bones can extend through skin as weapons

name: Flesh Patch
description: A small, leech-like creature that bonds with wounded flesh to seal injuries and promote rapid healing
effect: Takes 2 actions to apply. Stops bleeding condition immediately and restores 1d6 health. Creature dissolves after healing is complete.
usage_notes: Creature must crawl from container to wound site (1 action)
Bonds with flesh and begins healing process (1 action)
Restores health over next few minutes
Single-use - creature is consumed in the process

name: Boring Worm Drill
description: Rock-eating worm modified to tunnel through stone and metal on command

name: Living Hammer
description: Calcified creature that hardens its head on impact for striking

name: Cutting Grass Blade
description: Razor-sharp grass that maintains its edge through constant growth

name: Acid Torch
description: Bioluminescent organism that produces focused heat through chemical reaction

name: Living Crossbow
description: Creature with powerful tendons that launches bone projectiles

name: Filter Mask
description: Breathing apparatus creature that purifies air of toxins and diseases

name: Spy Beetle
description: Beetle with compound eyes that transmits visual information to its handler

name: Living Shovel
description: Mole-like appendage that rapidly excavates earth and stone

name: Sonic Probe
description: Echolocation organ that maps surroundings and detects hidden spaces

name: Living Shield
description: Turtle-shell organism that expands to block attacks

name: Trait Harvester
description: Symbiotic organism that extracts genetic traits from consumed creature parts

name: Mammoth Fur Graft
description: Implants woolly mammoth fur follicles for cold resistance

name: Salamander Regeneration
description: Implants salamander healing factor for limb regrowth
effect: Slowly regenerates lost limbs over time

name: Electric Eel Organs
description: Bioelectric organs that generate electrical discharges

name: Spider Silk Glands
description: Wrist-mounted glands that produce strong silk strands
effect: Can produce 30ft of silk rope per day

name: Chameleon Eyes
description: Independent eye movement and 360-degree vision

name: Rhino Hide Transplant
description: Thick, armor-like skin grafted from rhinoceros

name: Owl Silent Feathers
description: Sound-dampening feathers for stealth

name: Bloodhound Nose
description: Enhanced olfactory system for tracking
effect: Can track by scent, identify creatures by smell

name: Gecko Grip Pads
description: Microscopic setae on hands and feet for climbing

name: Trait Extractor Symbiont
description: Creature that safely extracts genetic material from living or dead organisms

name: Graft Applicator
description: Living tool that integrates foreign tissue into a host body

name: Trait Storage Vessel
description: Living container that preserves extracted traits indefinitely
